body_html: I think that's not what I need. All I need is to split my training because I am gonna use a big dataset in my final project and I won't be able to train my network for a lot of hours continuously. I would possibly need to train for 2 hours, save my model and after a while restore it to continue training. I can't find a tutorial like this which explains this problem exactly as I want.

body: I think that's not what I need. All I need is to split my training because I am gonna use a big dataset in my final project and I won't be able to train my network for a lot of hours continuously. I would possibly need to train for 2 hours, save my model and after a while restore it to continue training. I can't find a tutorial like this which explains this problem exactly as I want.
